# Support

If you need help with MediaCrate, open an issue in this repository.

## Before opening an issue

- Read `README.md`
- Search existing issues
- Include exact steps and error details

## What to include

- OS and version
- MediaCrate version/commit
- Input URL/source type
- Expected vs actual behavior
- Logs or screenshots

## Security reports

Do not open public issues for security problems.
Use `.github/SECURITY.md`.
